last_episode_to_air.name: Die Once, Die Twice
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Helm out of the country, Kronski must work alone to uncover evidence to prove that her client did not murder her husband.

name: Matt Helm
overview: Matt Helm is an American mystery television series which aired on the ABC Network during the 1975-1976 season. The title character was played by Anthony Franciosa.

episodes.name: Dead Men Talk
episodes.overview: Helm sets out to find an air freight company executive who disappeared after deciding to terminate his involvement with a drug smuggling ring.

episodes.name: Now I Lay Me Down to Die
episodes.overview: Helm is hired by a charming socialite with a dual personality to investigate a murder that she may have been committed while acting as her other self.

episodes.name: Scavenger's Paradise
episodes.overview: After the lawyer who was helping her find her natural parents is murdered, an adopted woman turns to Helm for help.

episodes.name: The Game of the Century
episodes.overview: Helm investigates the death of a tycoon who was going to be a player in the highest stakes poker game of all time.

episodes.name: Murder on Ice
episodes.overview: Helm agrees to help an old friend find his business partners, unaware that they had been involved in diamond smuggling.

episodes.name: Squeeze Play
episodes.overview: An old associate of Helm's becomes a hit man's target for no apparent reason.

episodes.name: Deadly Breed
episodes.overview: Helm investigates the kidnapping of a prized stud horse and the murders of the three men who had been watching the horse.

episodes.name: Death Rods
episodes.overview: Helm discovers a seriously wounded woman on the beach, only to find her gone when he returns with help.

episodes.name: Double Jeopardy
episodes.overview: After clearing a businessman of murder charges, Helm discovers some new evidence that points to the man's guilt.

episodes.name: Think Murder
episodes.overview: Matt investigates the death of a research scientist who was found frozen to death after an apparent skiing accident.

episodes.name: Murder on the Run
episodes.overview: While searching for a woman who was involved with a $250,000 robbery, Helm finds himself being trailed by her cohorts who are hoping he will lead them to the loot.

episodes.name: Panic
episodes.overview: Record pirates murder a detective friend of Helm's who had been hired to investigate possible piracy by a suspicious musician.

episodes.name: Die Once, Die Twice
episodes.overview: With Helm out of the country, Kronski must work alone to uncover evidence to prove that her client did not murder her husband.
